modName: ASIS Improved INI files for Enderal
summary: ASIS Files for Enderal for your mass spawning needs.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61707]These INI files [i]require[/i] [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18436]ASIS 1.40.8[/url] or higher. 1.42.4 is the latest version, I recommend using it!
If you are getting NullPointerExceptions, the problem and solution detailed in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/49699]this article[/url] are intended for you!
[/color]

This is an edit of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53047/]EggOver1979's ASIS Improved INI Files[/url] made to work with Enderal, so now you can get massive amounts of spawns in your game. So go over there and give him an endorsement as well.  All spawned enemies give XP.


[font=Courier New][size=4]NOTES:[/size][/font]

[list]
[*][b][u]Do not use Spawn Randomizer or NPC Potions.[/u] [/b]The former has not been set up for ASIS so it will not work. The Latter doesn't have the leveled lists for it, so it may lead to unintended anomalies.
[*]I'm not positive if the Enchantment Fix option is necessary.
[/list]

[font=Courier New][size=3]Warning: [/size][/font][font=Courier New]Side effects of ASIS in Enderal might include:[/font]
[list]
[*][size=1]Leveling too quickly[/size]
[*][size=1]Having too much loot[/size]
[*][size=1]Repeated Death[/size]
[*][size=1]Clones of NPCS that should not be cloned (I think I got most of them though.) Please report any unintended cloning.[/size]
[*][size=1]Massively increased difficulty.[/size]
[*][size=1]Badassery[/size]
[size=1]
[/size][/list][size=1]Consult your MCM Options to find the best spawn plan for you![/size]
author: Rylasasin
